overview: Toby and his girlfriend Crystal arrive at his father's house to do some studying. Crystal hasn't met his father, Hunter, yet, and Toby was more than happy to keep it that way. To him, Hunter is abrasive and a complete pig. But when Hunter struts into view moments later, she's suddenly hit with just HOW fine Hunter is. It's the Fourth of July and Penny is ready to celebrate with her Uncle Jonas and his family. Jonas has only recently married into Penny's family so she's never met relatives from his side but is eager to do so.
title: Alpha Male
